caption.p: Modeling structure of NAbs and RVFV Gn–Gc assembly. ( A) Overall structure of 1332F11 and RVFV Gn–Gc assembly. Fusion loop in Gc is shown as gold, and the rest of Gc is indicated as silver gray. NAbs and Gn are described as in Figure 6. ( B) Overall structure of 1331E4 and RVFV Gn–Gc assembly, as presented in ( A).
